1010101100101100 1011110101011001 0 -> sum: 0110100010000101, cout: 1
1000000011010100 1000001011101001 1 -> sum: 0000001110111110, cout: 1
1010100010100101 1011101111110100 1 -> sum: 0110010010011010, cout: 1
1101110011010101 0000110011101110 0 -> sum: 1110100111000011, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
